attributes.action: call for the release of innocent prisoners in China's prisons, in particular, Drapchi prison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: China detains many innocent prisoners.The majority of the innocent have either been arrested for speaking their views on the Chinese occupation of Tibet, or making a peaceful protest. People in the Tibetan Autonomous Region of China also get arrested for simply having a photograph of their spiritual leader the Dalai Lama. These people are paraded through the streets on open top trucks and taken to prison where they are tortured. We urge the prime minister to call for the release of the innocent in China's prisons, in particular Drapchi prison. Or to at least stop the torture and breaches of human rights

rejection.details: We approved your 11th Panchen Lama petition, but this one is too similar to petitions already up regarding human rights in China and Tibet
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
